channel.description: Recent content in Open Hardware on Food Manipulation

item.title: Wireless Perception Module
item.description: A module which interfaces sensors and wirelessly transmits high-bandwidth data over WiFi

item.title: Tactile Sensor
item.description: Introduction Vision-based tactile sensors that employ cameras to capture high-resolution tactile information ofa soft elastomer pad area. These types of sensors [1]â€“[5] have seen a rise in popularity and development as they have demonstrated utility in manipulation, identification, and inspection tasks. The idea is inspired by the research in Ted Adelson’s group. Measurement of contact forces of a robot gripper plays an important role in manipulation tasks, specifically food manipulation where forces on a utensil may convey food properties or states.
